hooks.name: format-on-save
hooks.command: poetry run black --quiet $(git diff --name-only --cached | grep -E '\.py$' || echo '')

hooks.name: lint-on-save
hooks.command: poetry run ruff check --fix $(git diff --name-only --cached | grep -E '\.py$' || echo '') 2>/dev/null || true
hooks.description: Auto-fix linting issues in changed files

hooks.name: validate-env
hooks.command: echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Environment file changed - verify no secrets were committed!'

hooks.name: quick-quality-check
hooks.command: poetry run black --check src/ && poetry run ruff check src/ && poetry run pytest tests/unit/test_core.py -x

hooks.name: performance-reminder
hooks.command: echo 'üìä Core solver modified - consider running: poetry run pytest tests/integration/test_performance_benchmarks.py'
